params.name: location
params.label: Location
params.description: Region in which to create the cluster, e.g. 'France Central'

params.name: useCustomNodeResourceGroup
params.label: Use custom Node Resource Group
params.description: Create node resources in a custom resource group

params.name: nodeResourceGroup
params.label: Node Resource Group
params.description: Name of the Resource Group where node resources will be created

params.name: useDistinctSPForCluster
params.label: Use distinct credentials
params.description: Associate cluster nodes with a specific Service Principal

params.name: clusterServicePrincipal
params.label: Identity assumed by nodes
params.description: Service principal used by the cluster's nodes (if different from the connection)

params.name: nodePools
params.label: Node pools
params.description: Node pools to create in the cluster

params.name: privateAccess
params.label: Private Cluster Endpoint
params.description: Cluster endpoint accessible through Private Link. If used, must set Load balancer SKU to Standard

params.name: networkPlugin
params.label: Kubernetes Network Plugin
params.description: Network plugin used for building Kubernetes network

params.name: serviceCIDR
params.label: Service CIDR
params.description: IP range for services in the cluster (cannot overlap the IP range of the pools' subnets)

params.name: dnsServiceIP
params.label: DNS IP
params.description: IP in the service IP range to use for the DNS server

params.name: dockerBridgeCidr
params.label: Docker Bridge CIDR
params.description: A CIDR notation IP range assigned to the Docker bridge network. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges or the Kubernetes service address range.
